data.message: Fix graph clustering and label overlap issues: Removed DAG mode (graph isn't a tree), added stronger charge repulsion (-300), added collision force, implemented smart label visibility with proximity detection, truncated long labels, added auto-fit after simulation, added zoom limits. Graph now shows 25 nodes cleanly spaced with readable labels. Commit: e56d80c6
data.task: Fix graph clustering and label overlap issues
data.outcome: Removed DAG mode (graph isn't a tree), added stronger charge repulsion (-300), added collision force, implemented smart label visibility with proximity detection, truncated long labels, added auto-fit after simulation, added zoom limits. Graph now shows 25 nodes cleanly spaced with readable labels. Commit: e56d80c6
